name: Delta A319-100 [N351NB] SUPER CLOSE UP Taxi and Shutdown in Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
When I saw this Delta A319 taxiing really close up to me, I certainly didn't expect for it to turn straight towards me and park 7 feet away O_o As you can see in the video, I couldn't fit the whole thing in the frame, even when I was fully zoomed out... CRAZY! It's at about 1:00 in the video that I'm thinking: "WHAT THE HECK IS THIS GUY DOING!?" Lol... Apologies for the lousy focus in some parts of the video... I didn't have it configured to zoom out this much :P

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
_____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO

Aircraft registration: N351NB
Callsign: Delta 99**
Runway used: 29 (Not seen in video)
Date Filmed: January 25, 2014
